Economy.bal:
bal <user>
Shows the balance of the user. If no user specified, shows your own
Economy.company:
company [info <company tag>/start]
You can either start a company (Requires $10k) or view stats about an existing company. If no tag entered, shows stats about all companies
Economy.buy:
buy [type] <amount>
Allows you to buy stocks.
Economy.sell:
sell [type] <amount>
Allows you to sell stocks.
